title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1221.13 - Persons entering or leaving terminal when not fully open for business required to show identification
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1221.13 - Persons entering or leaving terminal when not fully open for business required to show identification

State Regulations

During such days and hours as the terminal may not be
fully open for business such as Sundays, Saturdays, holidays, late hours of the
night and early hours of the morning, the occupant shall, when entering or
leaving the terminal, if requested by a Port Authority representative, exhibit
such authorization and means of identification as may from to time be
prescribed by the Port Authority or as may meet with the approval of such
representative. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1221.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
